participant_1.background:
I love to go paddle boarding with my friends because it's a fun and active way to spend time together
i m the oldest of three boys.
I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.
I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely.
i hate winter and the cold.

participant_2.background:
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
i love watching tv and movies.
i m looking for krav maga classes near my home.
i am a karate black belt.
My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
I'm doing pretty well! I just played a concert last night and it went really well! How's yours going?
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that. Mine is going well, I just got back from paddle boarding with some friends. It was a lot of fun!
Paddle boarding sounds like a lot of fun! I've never done it before, but it looks really cool. I'm more of a skier and snowboarder myself.
Oh yeah, I love skiing and snowboarding too! I'm actually a little nervous about winter coming up because I hate the cold.
I actually love winter! I love the snow and the cold weather. I think it's the perfect time to stay inside and watch movies and TV.
I know what you mean! I love curling up on the couch with a good movie or TV show.
Me too! What are some of your favorite movies and TV shows?
I love all kinds of movies and TV shows, but I'm really into sci-fi and fantasy right now. What about you?
I love sci-fi and fantasy too! I'm a big fan of Game of Thrones and Lord of the Rings.
Me too! I love Game of Thrones and Lord of the Rings are two of my favorite series.
Awesome! We should definitely watch them together sometime.
That sounds like a great idea
